Question: Qishun Innovation CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Qishun Innovation

Product: CES 2024 Highlights

- LG Signature OLED T TV with see-through display, impressive contrast, and innovative design
- Belkin Auto-Tracking Stand Pro, equipped with Apple’s DockKit technology for autonomous subject tracking and framing
- Volkswagen’s integration of ChatGPT into vehicles featuring the IDA voice assistant for enhanced conversational experience
- Hyte Keeb TKL Mechanical Keyboard with smooth key switches, customizable lighting, and unique design
- GE Profile Smart Indoor Smoker, offering indoor smoking solution with advanced smoke filtration technology and app connectivity
- Guidi, an AI smart belt for the visually impaired, providing a personal navigation system without the need for internet or GPS
- Panasonic’s collaboration with Amazon Fire TV for new experiential value for smart TVs, enhancing visual and sound quality
- Hisense UX 110-inch Mini-LED TV, featuring 10,000 nits peak brightness, 40,000 local dimming zones, and 100% DCI-P3 color spectrum coverage
- TCL QM7 Mini-LED TV, offering up to 2,000 nits brightness and 1,300 zones, providing high performance at an affordable price
- HP Omen Transcend 14, a gaming laptop with Meteor Lake chip, ideal for streaming applications and solid Windows 11 performance
Summary_cn:
奇顺创新

产品: CES 2024亮点

- LG Signature OLED T TV具有透明显示、令人印象深刻的对比度和创新设计
- Belkin Auto-Tracking Stand Pro，配备Apple的DockKit技术，可以进行自主的主体跟踪和取景
- 大众将ChatGPT集成到车辆中，配备IDA语音助手，提供更好的对话体验
- Hyte Keeb TKL机械键盘，具有平滑的按键开关、可定制的照明和独特的设计
- GE Profile智能室内烟熏机，提供具有先进烟雾过滤技术和应用连接的室内烟熏解决方案
- Guidi，一款为视障人士设计的人工智能智能腰带，可以提供个人导航系统，无需互联网或GPS
- 松下与亚马逊Fire TV合作，为智能电视提供新的体验价值，提升视觉和声音质量
- 海信UX 110英寸Mini-LED电视，拥有1万尼特峰值亮度、4万个局部调光区域和100% DCI-P3色域覆盖
- TCL QM7 Mini-LED电视，具有高达2000尼特亮度和1300个区域，以实惠的价格提供高性能
- HP Omen Transcend 14，一款配备Meteor Lake芯片的游戏笔记本电脑，适合流媒体应用和稳定的Windows 11性能
